TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeView extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 显示标记项的分层集合，每个标记项用一个 来表示。

span.span: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含所有对象分配给控件。The collection holds all the objects that are assigned to the control. 此集合中的树节点称为根树节点。The tree nodes in this collection are referred to as the root tree nodes. 任何后来添加到根树节点的树节点称为子节点。Any tree node that is subsequently added to a root tree node is referred to as a child node. 因为每个可以包含一系列其他对象，您可能会发现很难确定你的树状结构中的位置时循环访问集合。Because each can contain a collection of other objects, you might find it difficult to determine your location in the tree structure when you iterate through the collection. 可以分析通过使用字符串的字符串值来确定何处标签的起始和结束。You can parse the string by using the string value to determine where a label begins and ends. 您可以通过将分配中显示图像的树节点旁到属性并引用的索引值中若要将其分配。You can display images next to the tree nodes by assigning an to the property and referencing the index value of an in the to assign that . 使用以下属性分配图像：Use the following properties to assign images: - 设置属性的索引值想要在未选中树节点时显示。Set the property to the index value of the that you want to display when a tree node is not selected. - 设置属性的索引值想要在选定树节点时显示。Set the property to the index value of the that you want to display when a tree node is selected. 引用的映像并属性的值为分配到的所有树节点都显示的默认图像集合。The images referenced by the and property values are the default images displayed by all the tree nodes that are assigned to the collection. 每个树节点可通过设置覆盖默认映像和属性。Individual tree nodes can override the default images by setting the and properties. 在显示的状态图像是 16 x 16 像素，默认情况下。The state images displayed in the are 16 x 16 pixels by default. 设置属性的不会影响上图像的显示方式。Setting the property of the will have no effect on how the images are displayed. 但是，状态图像调整大小根据系统 DPI 设置时的 app.config 文件包含以下条目：However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 可以展开树节点以显示下一级别的子树节点。Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes. 用户可以展开通过单击加号 （+） 按钮，如果其中一个旁将显示，或可以展开通过调用方法。The user can expand the by clicking the plus-sign (+) button, if one is displayed next to the , or you can expand the by calling the method. 若要展开所有子树节点中的级别集合，请调用方法。To expand all the child tree node levels in the collection, call the method. 您可以折叠子级别通过调用方法或用户可以按减号 （-） 按钮，如果旁边显示一个。You can collapse the child level by calling the method, or the user can press the minus-sign (-) button, if one is displayed next to the . 您还可以调用展开和折叠状态之间进行交替的方法。You can also call the method to alternate between the expanded and collapsed states. 树节点可以选择显示的复选框。Tree nodes can optionally display check boxes. 若要显示复选框，请设置的属性到`true`。To display the check boxes, set the property of the to `true`. 属性设置为`true`对于树节点处于选中状态。The property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state. > [!NOTE] > 设置中的属性或事件导致该事件被引发多个时间并可能会导致意外行为。Setting the property from within the or event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior. 例如，你可能会设置事件处理程序中时以递归方式更新子节点，使用户无需展开，然后检查每个单独的属性。For example, you might set the property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually. 若要防止被多次引发事件，请将逻辑添加到事件处理程序，才会执行递归代码的属性未设置为。To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the property of the is not set to . 有关如何执行此操作的示例，请参阅示例部分或事件。For an example of how to do this, see the Example section of the or events. 您可以更改的外观通过设置其显示和样式属性的一些控件。You can change the appearance of the control by setting some of its display and style properties. 设置到`true`显示每个旁边的加号或减号按钮，可以展开或折叠，分别。Setting to `true` displays a plus-sign or minus-sign button next to each that can be expanded or collapsed, respectively. 设置属性设置为`true`导致显示关联在一起的根树节点的行。Setting the property to `true` causes the to display lines that join all the root tree nodes together. 可以显示通过设置连接到其根节点的子树节点的线条属性设置为`true`。You can display lines that connect child tree nodes to their root node by setting the property to `true`. 设置属性设置为`true`更改树节点标签的外观在鼠标指针移过它们。Setting the property to `true` changes the appearance of the tree node labels as the mouse pointer passes over them. 在热跟踪，树节点标签采用外观变为超链接。When hot-tracked, the tree node labels take on the appearance of a hyperlink. 你可以完全自定义外观控件。You can also completely customize the appearance of the control. 若要执行此操作，设置属性的值以外的其他，并处理事件。To do this, set the property to a value other than and handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 设置时， ， ，和在运行时，属性重新创建句柄 (请参阅) 来更新控件的外观。When setting the , , , and properties at run time, the handle is recreated (see ) to update the control's appearance. 这将导致所有树节点为 collapsed，除所选。This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control. [!code-csharp[TreeViewMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewMisc/cs/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[TreeViewMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewMisc/vb/form1.vb#10)] 以下、 更复杂的代码示例显示的客户信息控件。The following, more complex code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 名客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的通过使用抑制和方法和等待显示时创建和绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求具有`Customer`对象，可以保留一系列`Order`对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还需要具有名为的光标文件`MyWait.cur`应用程序目录中创建的实例控制上。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，展开所有节点，和一个处理程序添加为事件。First, all the nodes are expanded, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，所有节点处于折叠状态。Next, all the nodes are collapsed. 事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有检查的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果节点已选中的子节点，折叠该节点的取消。If a node has checked children, the collapse is canceled for that node. 单击节点旁边的减号时，以便标准节点折叠然后删除事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node collapse when the minus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行为还可以通过处理事件，如该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/CPP/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/CS/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/VB/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表有助于您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`TreeView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TreeView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 在编辑树节点标签文本后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the tree node label text is edited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例可让用户使用编辑非根树节点。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标处的位置确定和存储在变量名为`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了非根树节点，它会处于可编辑状态，这样用户就可以编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后，新的标签文本计算，并保存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 对于此示例中，有几个字符被视为不在标签文本中有效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果一个无效字符中的标签字符串，或者该字符串为空，用户将收到错误通知和标签返回到其以前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点处于折叠都状态，并添加一个处理程序为事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，所有节点会展开。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有检查的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果节点不具有选中的子级，扩展将被取消该节点。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 单击节点旁边的加号，以便标准的节点展开然后删除事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行为还可以通过处理事件，如该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要维护性能，而项将添加到一次一个地，调用方法。To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the , call the method. 方法会从之前的绘制控件调用方法。The method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 若要将项添加到树视图控件的首选的方法是使用方法以将树节点项的数组添加到树视图。The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view. 但是，如果你想要添加一次一项，使用方法，以阻止添加操作期间进行绘制的控件。However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the method to prevent the control from painting during the add operations. 若要允许继续绘制的控件，调用所有树节点添加到树视图后的方法。To allow the control to resume painting, call the method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的客户信息控件。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 名客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的通过使用抑制和方法和等待显示时创建和绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求具有`Customer`对象，可以保留一系列`Order`对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还需要具有名为的光标文件`MyWait.cur`应用程序目录中创建的实例控制上。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 树节点标签和树节点的左边显示复选框(如果有）。A check box is displayed to the left of both the tree node label and tree node , if any. 复选框允许用户一次选择多个树节点。Check boxes allow the user to select more than one tree node at a time. 时的属性设置为`true`，和属性设置，每个中包含的显示的第一个和第二个映像以指示未选中或选中状态，分别。When the property of a is set to `true`, and the property is set, each that is contained in the displays the first and second images from the to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively. 但是，显示的图像可能会出现以下情况时不同：如果节点的设置为 0 或 1 以外的值和的父对象设置为`false`，则将不会自动重置为-1 以指示未设置。However, the displayed images may be different if the following situation occurs: If the of the node is set to a value other than 0 or 1, and the property of the parent is set to `false`, the will not automatically reset to -1 to indicate it is not set. 在这种情况下，显示指示的索引位置处的状态图像。In this case, the state image at the indicated index position is shown. 如果设置为`true`同样，第一个和第二个图像的显示以分别指示选中或取消选中状态。If is set to `true` again, the first and second images of the are shown to indicate a checked or unchecked state, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 设置时属性在运行时，重新创建句柄 (请参阅) 来更新控件的外观。When setting the property at run time, the handle is recreated (see ) to update the control's appearance. 这将导致所有树节点为 collapsed，但所选。This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点处于折叠都状态，并添加一个处理程序为事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，所有节点会展开。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有检查的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果节点不具有选中的子级，扩展将被取消该节点。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 单击节点旁边的加号，以便标准的节点展开然后删除事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行为还可以通过处理事件，如该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将所有折叠对象，其中包括所有的子树节点，位于控件。The method collapses all the objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the control. > [!NOTE] > 状态仍然存在。The state of a persists. 例如，假设你打电话给根树节点的方法。For example, suppose that you call the method for a root tree node. 如果先前没有折叠子树节点，它们将显示在其以前的展开状态。If the child tree nodes were not previously collapsed, they will appear in their previously-expanded state. 调用方法可确保所有树节点都显示在处于折叠状态。Calling the method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点处于折叠都状态，并添加一个处理程序为事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，所有节点会展开。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有检查的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果节点不具有选中的子级，扩展将被取消该节点。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 单击节点旁边的加号，以便标准的节点展开然后删除事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行为还可以通过处理事件，如该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 节点的通常由操作系统绘制。The nodes of a are typically drawn by the operating system. 属性，可以自定义节点的外观。The property lets you customize the appearance of the nodes. 若要执行此操作，设置到或，并提供的处理程序事件。To do this, set to or and provide a handler for the event. 这称为所有者描述。This is called owner drawing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义使用所有者描述的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 在示例中的控件将显示标准节点标签以及可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 通过使用指定节点标记属性。Node tags are specified by using the property. 控件还使用自定义颜色，包括自定义突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, which include a custom highlight color. 你可以自定义的大多数设置颜色的颜色属性，但不能作为属性的选择突出显示颜色。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形将扩展仅围绕节点标签。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 若要绘制的节点标记并绘制自定义突出显示矩形足够大以容纳一个节点标记，则必须使用所有者描述。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此事件可自定义中的节点的外观使用所有者描述的控件。Use this event to customize the appearance of nodes in a control using owner drawing. 引发此事件时，才属性设置为的值或。This event is raised only when the property is set to values of or . 下表指示如何可以进行自定义当属性设置为这些值。The following table indicates how the can be customized when the property is set to these values. |DrawMode 属性值DrawMode property value|树节点自定义项TreeNode customization| |-----------------------------|----------------------------| ||可以自定义标签区域。The label area can be customized. 所有其他自动绘制元素。All other elements are drawn automatically.| ||整个外观可以自定义。The appearance of the entire can be customized. 图标、 复选框、 加号和减号以及连接节点的线必须根据需要手动绘制。Icons, check boxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes must be drawn manually if they are desired.| 在区域的该值所占用，如果已使用由指定的字体绘制控件的属性是在其中可单击一个节点以选择它的区域。The region that the value would occupy if it were drawn using the font specified by the control's property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it. 这称为命中的测试区域。This is called the hit test region. 如果绘制此区域外，应提供你自己选择节点时单击它的可见区域的代码。If you draw outside this region, you should provide your own code that selects a node when its visible area is clicked. 命中的测试区域对应于属性时使用。The hit test region corresponds to the property when using . 使用时，但属性包含的整个宽度。When using , however, the property encompasses the entire width of the . 在这种情况下，可以通过获取访问命中的测试区域值和访问其属性。In this case, you can access the hit test region by getting the value and accessing its property. 然后，您可以绘制这些边界内的节点的命中的测试区域也可以提供自己的命中的测试代码。You can then draw the hit test region of the node within these bounds, or you can provide your own hit test code. 请注意，设置属性不会更改命中的测试区域，这计算整个使用指定的字体大小。Note that setting the property does not change the size of the hit test region, which is calculated using the font specified for the entire . 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义使用所有者描述的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 在示例中的控件将显示标准节点标签以及可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 通过使用指定节点标记属性。Node tags are specified by using the property. 控件还使用自定义颜色，包括自定义突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, which include a custom highlight color. 你可以自定义的大多数设置颜色的颜色属性，但不能作为属性的选择突出显示颜色。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形将扩展仅围绕节点标签。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 若要绘制的节点标记并绘制自定义突出显示矩形足够大以容纳一个节点标记，则必须使用所有者描述。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在示例中，处理程序节点标记和自定义选择突出显示手动事件绘制。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些数据，属性设置为`true`，以便它们将由操作系统绘制。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 此外，处理程序事件提供命中测试。Additionally, a handler for the event provides hit-testing. 默认情况下，可以通过单击其标签周围的区域选择节点。By default, a node can be selected only by clicking the region around its label. 事件处理程序选择一个节点，此区域内或节点标记，围绕区域内任意位置单击，如果存在。The event handler selects a node that is clicked anywhere within this region or within the region around a node tag, if present. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要维护性能，而项将添加到一次一个地，调用方法。To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the , call the method. 方法会从之前的绘制控件调用方法。The method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 若要将项添加到树视图控件的首选的方法是使用方法以将树节点项的数组添加到树视图。The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view. 但是，如果你想要添加一次一项，使用方法，以阻止添加操作期间进行绘制的控件。However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the method to prevent the control from painting during the add operations. 若要允许控件要重新开始绘制的控件，调用所有树节点添加到树视图后的方法。To allow control the control to resume painting, call the method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的客户信息控件。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 名客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的通过使用抑制和方法和等待显示时创建和绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求具有`Customer`对象，可以保留一系列`Order`对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还需要具有名为的光标文件`MyWait.cur`应用程序目录中创建的实例控制上。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，则属性不起作用。If the property is set to `true`, the property has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 当属性设置为`true`，每个树节点标签当鼠标指针移外观变为超链接都将通过它。When the property is set to `true`, each tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it. 字体样式应用于和设置为蓝色，从而使标签显示为链接。The font style is applied to the and the is set to blue to make the label appear as a link. 外观不受用户的操作系统的 Internet 设置。The appearance is not controlled by the Internet settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个自定义。The following code example illustrates a customized . 通过继承类，此自定义版本具有一个典型的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical . 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供唯一外观。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因为属性设置为`false`，自定义的控件还重写方法，以便节点可以展开和折叠在被单击时。Because the property is set to `false`, the customized control also overrides the method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以这种方式自定义的控件可在整个组织，以便提供一致的接口，而无需在每个项目指定的控件属性使用。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现拖放操作中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to enable drag-and-drop operations within a control. 在此示例中，任何节点可以拖动到另一个节点不被拖动节点的后代。In this example, any node can be dragged to another node that is not a descendant of the dragged node. 被拖动的节点，其中包括所有子代节点，成为目标节点的子成员。The dragged node, which includes all its descendant nodes, becomes a child of the destination node. 使用鼠标左键时，被拖动的节点移动到目标节点。When the left mouse button is used, the dragged node is moved to the destination node. 使用鼠标右键时，拖动的节点复制到目标节点。When the right mouse button is used, the dragged node is copied to the destination node. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法仅适用于属性是`true`。The method works only if the property is `true`. 如果是`false`当您尝试编辑的标签，将引发异常和树节点将不处于可编辑状态。If is `false` when you attempt to edit the label, an exception will be thrown and the tree node will not be put in to an editable state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例可让用户使用编辑非根树节点。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标处的位置确定和存储在变量名为`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了非根树节点，它会处于可编辑状态，这样用户就可以编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后，新的标签文本计算，并保存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 对于此示例中，有几个字符被视为不在标签文本中有效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果一个无效字符中的标签字符串，或者该字符串为空，用户将收到错误通知和标签返回到其以前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一系列对象，其中每个属性，它可以包含其自身。The property holds a collection of objects, each of which has a property that can contain its own . 此嵌套的树节点可能会使它难以导航树状结构，但属性，则可以更轻松地确定你的树状结构中的位置。This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure, but the property makes it easier to determine your location within the tree structure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的客户信息控件。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 名客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的通过使用抑制和方法和等待显示时创建和绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求具有`Customer`对象，可以保留一系列`Order`对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还需要创建的实例对的 control 权限。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`true`，则属性将被忽略。If is set to `true`, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个自定义。The following code example illustrates a customized . 通过继承类，此自定义版本具有一个典型的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical . 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供唯一外观。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因为属性设置为 false，则自定义的控件还重写方法，以便节点可以展开和折叠在被单击时。Because the property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以这种方式自定义的控件可在整个组织，以便提供一致的接口，而无需在每个项目指定的控件属性使用。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根树节点才旁显示加号和减号按钮属性值是`true`。The plus sign and minus sign buttons appear next to the root tree nodes only if the property value is `true`. 如果未显示加号和减号按钮，没有视觉提示存在是为了指示树节点包含子树节点，并且可展开。If the plus sign and minus sign buttons are not displayed, no visual cue exists to indicate that the tree node contains child tree nodes and is expandable. 然后，用户必须双击以确定它是否包含子树节点，将其展开，或可折叠的树节点。The user then must double-click a tree node to determine whether it contains child tree nodes, to expand it, or to collapse it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个自定义。The following code example illustrates a customized . 通过继承类，此自定义版本具有一个典型的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical . 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供唯一外观。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因为属性设置为 false，则自定义的控件还重写方法，以便节点可以展开和折叠在被单击时。Because the property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以这种方式自定义的控件可在整个组织，以便提供一致的接口，而无需在每个项目指定的控件属性使用。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重新应用默认进行排序，这是节点文本的字母顺序或指定的自定义排序属性。This method reapplies the default sort, which is alphabetical by node text, or a custom sort specified by the property. 如果更改现有节点的文本或节点被移动用户，并且你想要再次对项进行排序，可以使用此方法。You can use this method if the text of existing nodes is changed or nodes are moved by the user, and you want to sort the items again. > [!NOTE] > 使用默认排序方法基于应用程序指定。The default sorter uses the method based on the specified by the application. 这意味着具有相等值的对象添加到中的顺序保留控件。This means that objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the control. 此行为可能不同，如果应用自定义排序。This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.
